name: MAPPY-LAND
description: Mappy, the police mouse, has prepared all kinds of wonderful birthday presents for his girlfriend, Mapico. But the big cheese in the feline world, Nyamco, has ordered his clowder to hide the presents throughout Mappyland. If he's going to make it to Mapico's birthday party on time, Mappy will have to double-time it on finding those gifts! Avoid and activate traps to knock out those crafty cats headed your way. You can also use special items hidden in the level to distract them. Collect six of the same presents to move on to another stage. Can Mappy make it through all eight towns and survive the onslaught of claws?
